author: Simon Difford
description: The pineapple and egg white ensure that this delightful Daiquiri has an appropriately white frothy head.
name: Snow White Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
Then DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
